about_the_game:
Dark Mind: Morpheus Protocol

The mind is a treacherous abyss—a twisted maze of nightmares and memories where reality bends, and survival is anything but certain.

Ethan Graves, elite agent of the secret Morpheus Project, faces his deadliest mission yet. His target: the mind of Markus Fierce, a cult leader responsible for unspeakable horrors. Now in a coma after a brutal escape, Fierce holds the key to saving Sara, the kidnapped daughter of the President. Time is running out.

With only Ann, an advanced AI, to guide him, Ethan descends into a nightmare. Here, shadows whisper, monsters stalk the corridors of memory, and the very world conspires to break him. Every step deeper unravels terrifying truths—and escaping may be impossible.

Can you survive a mind that wants you dead?

A NIGHTMARE YOU WON’T FORGET

Dark Mind: Morpheus Protocol is a gripping survival horror experience blending psychological terror, action, and mystery. Every encounter could be your last.

KEY FEATURES:

A Twisting Psychological Thriller – Uncover the horrifying truth buried in Fierce’s subconscious before it’s too late.

Haunting, Unpredictable Environments – Traverse ever-shifting landscapes of fear and madness.

Survival at Any Cost – Face grotesque nightmares with scarce resources. Fight or flee—your choices define your fate.

A Living Nightmare Brought to Life – Cinematic storytelling and relentless tension keep you on edge from start to finish.

Dare to enter?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070

short_description: Agent Ethan Graves dives into the mind of a monstrous cult leader, a decaying nightmare where reality twists and sanity shatters. Guided only by an AI, he must navigate horrors beyond comprehension to save a child’s life. But in a mind built to trap him… will he ever escape?
